name: University of Southern Queensland
description: The University of Southern Queensland is a learner-focussed and community-oriented university which is committed to flexible off-campus, on-campus and online education . At present USQ has approximately 26,000 enrolled students, 75% of whom enjoy the benefits of off-campus study, including students in over 80 countries other than Australia. We offer 147 of our 198 accredited programs via distance education and/or online; these programs range from the Tertiary Preparation Program, which aims to provide equitable access to tertiary study, to undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programs in Arts, Business, Education, Engineering and Surveying and Sciences.
